name: send-pr
title: Send PR
description: Sends a PR from Arc's clipboard to a teams channel(chat) or a user(direct message)
author: camiloaromero23

commands.name: index
commands.title: Send PR
commands.description: Sends a PR from Arc's clipboard to a teams channel(chat) or a user(direct message)

preferences.description: Enter the Chat ID of the Teams channel you want to send the PR to
preferences.name: chatId
preferences.title: Chat ID

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
